articles.title: More than 160 people are still missing after deadly Texas floods, governor says
articles.description: Search and rescue teams are continuing to probe debris for those still missing after deadly floods struck central Texas five days ago [4, 5].

articles.title: Trump caught off guard by Pentagon's abrupt move to pause Ukraine weapons deliveries, AP sources say
articles.description: Multiple sources indicate that Trump was surprised by the Pentagon's decision to temporarily halt weapon deliveries to Ukraine [2, 4].

articles.title: Citizens of more than 70 countries can now visit China without a visa
articles.description: China has implemented a new policy that allows citizens from over 70 countries to visit without needing a visa [2, 4].
